c.x: In this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.

"Breakage" means the remainder of the distributable pool after the will pay

"Common pool" means the merging of a betting pool at the live site with the
"Dead heat" means that the noses of two or more horses reached the finish l

"Minimum pay" means a will pay in the amount of $1.05 per $1 bet.
"Minus pool" means the amount by which the total minimum pay for all succes
"Net common pool" means the merging of a net pool at the live site with the
"Net pool" means the betting pool minus the takeout.
"Official" means the purposeful posting of the final order of finish in a r
